title: Does Ariana Grande write her own music? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hello..I would assume to say yes. To fully agree, No! There are many many music artists that spend a great amount in the light of their day to compose a fitting emotion of feelings. Some are like fictional, some can connect, but it is hard to make the comparison of how one is dealing with the things in their lives, so to place music into a perspective emotional roller coaster ride, can be just as hard. It is like writing but has an alter ego to place the human feelings of emotions into the storyline! That is what music is….Placing a moment in a time that becomes reasonable to connect!! So some writers seem to write like poets, some pick up rhymes, then if it is just words? Others try drama! Moments of emotions. Some are not meant to be personal..well others either elicit other peoples behaviours other than their own. Some composers and writers just try to write up a script of questions, or create what if scenario's. But it then sets up Music, and Music has either functions in being played to the word responses as lyrics. Then there is Keys to be used! Then this is only why some music writing artists want something that they would like to try. You know, not everyone can just sing some song…well they can but if they did not write it or play the notes for it. Just a short version of a song! Other artists are Taylor Swift, Meghan Trainer, Katey Perry!!! Just fine examples of music! Guys…well Depends on Music and Types..we listen to. We do not necessarily like every song these artists sing either..example Adam Levine! Usher! Flo Ride! I think people that trick themselves into believing they are music artists should follow a book to know the paths. Tough!! Tough to reckon with to make it to the top!! Thia goes out to All those Musical Artists…that stood twists and turns in recording and producing it!

As far as I’m concerned she has never released a song she truly wrote. She may not have even co-written a song That has been released. I say this cause, sure on her albums you’ll see her name along with 4 or 5 different people listed as song writers. But in reality that doesn’t mean she wrote a word. That just means she made her own Ad-libs to the song, which isn’t really impressive. I’m not an Ariana fan so I’m not 100% certain, but I’m sure there are writers demos of her songs out there if you search for them. A writers demo is pretty much the original song writer makes the track and sings the song like they want the singer to.if the singer likes it, they make an amped up cover and slaps there name on the track. Artists like Celine Dion And Justin Bieber made careers out of it.

I'm a follower of Ariana and i probably would say no she doesn't writes her own music. Yep sometimes big Artists do mange to write for her but she herself as per my knowledge hasn't yet been acknowledged for writing her own songs which are also superhit. However, She has her own big production although she gets music album offers from other big music producers of the industry so that probably indicates she isn't the writer but the singer. Hope it helps.

Wow that really don’t matter, what matter is her fan base loves whoever is writing the music. Remember in this day and time you don’t have to have a lick of music writing skills, you don’t even have to sing that great, all you have to have is an unshakable desire to make it big in the business as an artist, you got computers to make you sound good, people to produce and write music for you and all you have to do is practice, memorize songs look good and put your game face on. God Bless

according to the different sources, it has been revealed that she wrote some of her songs but all of them for example; All My Love (Major Lazer song)Almost Is Never EnoughBe Alright (Ariana Grande song)Bed (Nicki Minaj song)Best MistakeEveryday (Ariana Grande song)Focus (song)God Is a WomanGreedy (song)Into You (Ariana Grande song)Let Me Love You (Ariana Grande song)The Light Is Comingamong others

She wrote “Everytime, Sweetener, God is a Woman, No Tears Left to Cry, Breathin, Pete Davidson,). Those are the songs where she is listed first, but she still had a co writer, Pharell in most cases. She also co-wrote these songs on Sweetener: “The Light is coming, Better Off, Goodnight n Go, Get Well Soon” There are plenty of songs she co wrote. You can search them online

she’s not exactly a song-writer but she has started writing more of her songs. not exactly her whole songs but participated in co-writing. she’s been a part in the writing of every track on her last two albums. (not entirely sure about EVERY track in sweetener but on apple music and a magazine I have that she’s on, it says that so it could be true).

I am not that familiar with her or her music to know much. But I assume that she is rather a singer and not a composer. She may write some of her songs but I do not know if she only songs her own songs or she has somebody to help her. Most of singers have someone to help them to compose and produce their music.

Problem, My Everything, Best Mistake, Santa Tell Me, Focus, Moonlight, Be Alright, Into you, Side to Side, Let me love you, Everyday, I Don't Care, Bad Decisions, No Tears Left to Cry, The Light is Coming, God is a Woman, Sweetner, Everytime, Breathin, Better Off, Good Night N go, Pete Davidson, and Get Well Soon are all good songs she wrote along with Pink Champagne
As far as I know: none. At best she probably picks songs from professional songwriters and maybe provides them with some lyrics, but actual song writing by Ariana Grande I’m not aware of.
She co-writes most of it.

Yes, Ariana Grande writes her own songs, but (presumably) focuses on the Lyrics and Vocal Melodies, as I haven’t heard of her playing an instrument or producing “beats” (putting Pop / Hip-Hop Instrumentals together). Source: Category:Songs written by Ariana Grande - Wikipedia

Ariana grande has made total four albums till date and there are a lot many songs that I haven't heard. Her fourth album released just 2 days ago. And some of mine favorites by Her are - Focus One last time Side to side — ft. Nikki minaj Into you Bang Bang — ft. Nikki minaj Jessi j Everyday No tears left to cry God is a woman Power
Does Ariana Grande write her own songs? When she collaborates with others, do they do 90% of the writing or does she do most of it?

well she has co-written most of her songs alongside big names in the music industry like Max Martin and Pharrell Williams.
No, little to none of modern pop and country artist compose their own works
